TMDA Download

Latest Release:
Download the latest release:

  • Standard gzipped tarball:
    • Sourceforge
    • Mirror Site (Central Europe)
    • Mirror Site (Japan)

  • SRPM and RedHat-7.x RPM:
    • Sourceforge
    • rpmfind.net
    • Mirror Site (Central Europe)
    • Mirror Site (Japan)

  • Debian Package

  • If you run FreeBSD, TMDA is part of the "ports" tree (mail/tmda)

Old Releases:
Past releases are available for download as well.

Development Sources:
For those who prefer the bleeding edge. If you are using non-released code, you should be reading the tmda-cvs mailing list to stay abreast of changes.

  • CVS Access:
    The TMDA development sources can be accessed via anonymous (pserver) CVS through module tmda.

  • Nightly Snapshots:
    Snapshots of the current development sources are checked out from CVS and tarballed each morning at 08:00 UTC.
